name: XPELLIT
description:
XPELLIT

Start your third person adventure together with more people online in this anime style world.

Wield your sword or use your magic to achieve victory, get stronger by upgrading your equipment and using XPELLITEMS that are unlocked as you level up.

Explore dungeons and defeat enemies and bosses to get extra gold and level up, by gaining experience you will unlock new equipment and you can give your character a new class. You can be a strong warrior, a skilled mage, a skilled healer, and even an efficient assassin. It all depends on your imagination.



Features:

  • Exciting third person combat full of magic and action.

  • Equipment system with which you can create the class that best suits your style of play.

  • Multiple game modes where you can have fun with friends.

  • Design focused on teamwork where you must create strategies to obtain victory.

  • Free of payment.

  • Unique skins.
